# (APPENDIX) Appendix {-}

# Coursework evaluation

You will be evaluated based on submission of a portfolio of work produced as part of the module.
You will be awared extra marks if the work is reproducible, a vital component of scientific work.

We recommend using a template for a reproducible report, such as this one which was created for the module: https://github.com/ITSLeeds/reproducibleCoursework
